title: A Week In The Life, Vol 16.
description: Happy EASTER! We had such a packed week! School boy! Then it was Easy Everyday eve! Emilia read at mass. Eddie got me the tallest prettiest flowers ever! Then we went to the book launch! It was so fun and this is my fave indie bookstore in the pittsburgh area. Fun fun fun! Back to […] The post A Week In The Life, Vol 16. appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: Happy EASTER! We had such a packed week! School boy! Then it was Easy Everyday eve! Emilia read at mass. Eddie got me the tallest prettiest flowers ever! Then we went to the book launch! It was so fun and this is my fave indie bookstore in the pittsburgh area. Fun fun fun! Back to […]
text: Happy EASTER! We had such a packed week! School boy! Then it was Easy Everyday eve! Emilia read at mass. Eddie got me the tallest prettiest flowers ever! Then we went to the book launch! It was so fun and this is my fave indie bookstore in the pittsburgh area. Fun fun fun! Back to real life the next morning! Little loves. It was hot this week! This, constantly. Hop hop hop. My little tween. Almost. Cutest girl. Cheese! They kill me. My favorites. Then an ice cream date! We love dyeing eggs. And using the eggmazing! This keeps them entertained forever. My kind of eggs. Ready for the bunny! I hope they always love each other this much! Early birds. I didn’t decorate much for easter this year so we used these as centerpieces! Such a beautiful day! Please notice Max’s shirt… ha. Little love bug! Then we hosted easter here! Food comas all around. And then we all needed Easter naps!
html:
Happy EASTER!

We had such a packed week!

School boy!

Then it was Easy Everyday eve!

Emilia read at mass.

Eddie got me the tallest prettiest flowers ever!

Then we went to the book launch!

It was so fun and this is my fave indie bookstore in the pittsburgh area.

Fun fun fun!

Back to real life the next morning!

Little loves.

It was hot this week!

This, constantly.

Hop hop hop.

My little tween. Almost.

Cutest girl.

Cheese!

They kill me.

My favorites.

Then an ice cream date!

We love dyeing eggs.

And using the eggmazing!

This keeps them entertained forever.

My kind of eggs.

Ready for the bunny!

I hope they always love each other this much!

Early birds.

I didn’t decorate much for easter this year so we used these as centerpieces!

Such a beautiful day!

Please notice Max’s shirt… ha.

Little love bug!

Then we hosted easter here!

Food comas all around.

And then we all needed Easter naps!
